page.title: 11Inverkeithing High School
page.content:
Inverkeithing High School was officially opened in{1973}by{HRH {Princess Alexandra}although it was in use in 1972.
It is situated in Hillend Road but can be accessed from many directions. There are about{1600}pupils in the school and over{100}staff.
Before the school was built the site was covered with fields and wetland.
In the school grounds there are 4 rugby/soccer pitches,2 hockey pitches and 2 tennis courts. The school is well equipped with science & computer facilities and has good academic and sporting reputations.
